statements: SELECT * FROM contactless_payment_terminals;
SELECT terminal_id, location FROM contactless_payment_terminals WHERE maintenance_due_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT location, latitude, longitude FROM contactless_payment_terminals WHERE location LIKE 'New%';
SELECT * FROM contactless_payment_terminals ORDER BY location ASC;
SELECT terminal_id, location, maintenance_due_date FROM contactless_payment_terminals WHERE maintenance_due_date < CURRENT_DATE;
SELECT * FROM contactless_payment_terminals;
SELECT terminal_id, location, maintenance_due_date FROM contactless_payment_terminals WHERE location LIKE 'New%';
SELECT * FROM contactless_payment_terminals ORDER BY maintenance_due_date DESC;
SELECT terminal_id, location, latitude, longitude FROM contactless_payment_terminals WHERE latitude > 40 AND longitude < -80;
SELECT location, maintenance_due_date FROM contactless_payment_terminals WHERE maintenance_due_date BETWEEN '2022-10-01' AND '2023-01-01';
SELECT * FROM contactless_payment_terminals;
SELECT terminal_id, terminal_type, maintenance_status, location_id FROM contactless_payment_terminals;
SELECT location_id, location_name FROM terminal_locations ORDER BY location_name DESC;
SELECT terminal_id, terminal_type, maintenance_status FROM contactless_payment_terminals WHERE maintenance_status = TRUE;
SELECT terminal_id, terminal_type, location_name FROM contactless_payment_terminals INNER JOIN terminal_locations ON contactless_payment_terminals.location_id = terminal_locations.location_id;
SELECT * FROM contactless_payment_terminals;
SELECT terminal_id, location_id, terminal_type FROM contactless_payment_terminals WHERE maintenance_status = TRUE;
SELECT terminal_id, location_id, terminal_type FROM contactless_payment_terminals WHERE maintenance_status = FALSE;
SELECT * FROM terminal_locations ORDER BY location_name ASC;
SELECT location_id, location_name, latitude, longitude FROM terminal_locations WHERE latitude > 40 AND longitude < -100;
SELECT * FROM contactless_payment_terminals;
SELECT terminal_id, location, last_maintenance_date FROM contactless_payment_terminals WHERE is_active = TRUE;
SELECT location, last_maintenance_date FROM contactless_payment_terminals WHERE terminal_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM contactless_payment_terminals ORDER BY last_maintenance_date DESC;
SELECT location FROM contactless_payment_terminals ORDER BY terminal_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM contactless_payment_terminals WHERE is_active = TRUE;
SELECT terminal_id, location, last_maintenance_date FROM contactless_payment_terminals WHERE location LIKE '%mall%' ORDER BY last_maintenance_date DESC;
SELECT c.location, m.maintenance_date, m.maintenance_notes FROM contactless_payment_terminals c LEFT JOIN maintenance_logs m ON c.terminal_id = m.terminal_id WHERE m.maintenance_date >= '2022-01-01';

SELECT t.terminal_id, t.location, u.usage_date, u.transaction_amount FROM contactless_payment_terminals t INNER JOIN terminals_usage u ON t.terminal_id = u.terminal_id WHERE u.transaction_amount >= 1000 ORDER BY u.usage_date ASC;
SELECT t.location, COUNT(u.usage_id) AS total_usage FROM contactless_payment_terminals t LEFT JOIN terminals_usage u ON t.terminal_id = u.terminal_id GROUP BY t.location ORDER BY total_usage DESC;
SELECT * FROM contactless_payment_terminals;
SELECT terminal_id, location, maintenance_status FROM contactless_payment_terminals WHERE maintenance_status = TRUE;
SELECT terminal_id, location FROM contactless_payment_terminals ORDER BY location ASC;
SELECT * FROM terminal_maintenance_logs ORDER BY log_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM terminal_location_tracking WHERE latitude > 50 AND longitude < 0;
SELECT * FROM contactless_payment_terminals WHERE maintenance_status = TRUE;
SELECT terminal_id, location FROM contactless_payment_terminals WHERE location LIKE '%Station%';
SELECT tech_id, tech_name, tech_phone FROM maintenance_techs WHERE tech_phone IS NOT NULL;
SELECT t.terminal_id, t.location, l.tracking_date FROM contactless_payment_terminals t JOIN terminal_location_tracking l ON t.terminal_id = l.terminal_id;
SELECT t.terminal_id, t.location, m.log_date, m.log_details FROM contactless_payment_terminals t JOIN terminal_maintenance_logs m ON t.terminal_id = m.terminal_id ORDER BY m.log_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM contactless_payment_terminals;
SELECT terminal_id, location FROM contactless_payment_terminals WHERE status = 'Active';
SELECT MAX(last_maintenance_date) FROM contactless_payment_terminals;
SELECT terminal_id, COUNT(*) FROM terminal_history GROUP BY terminal_id;
SELECT * FROM terminal_issues ORDER BY reported_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM contactless_payment_terminals;
SELECT terminal_id, location, status FROM contactless_payment_terminals ORDER BY location DESC;
SELECT * FROM terminal_issues WHERE reported_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT th.history_id, tp.location, th.maintenance_worker FROM terminal_history th JOIN contactless_payment_terminals tp ON th.terminal_id = tp.terminal_id;
SELECT tt.tracking_id, tt.terminal_id, tt.tracking_date, mw.worker_name FROM terminal_tracking tt INNER JOIN maintenance_workers mw ON tt.tracking_date = mw.worker_name ORDER BY tracking_date DESC;
